data.title: Majdal
data.meta_description: al-Majdal is BADILs magazine on Palestinian refugees. The magazine aims to raise public awareness and support for a just solution to Palestinian residency and refugee issues. Readers can view past issues of al-majdal by year through the archive. BADILs previous english language magazine was calledAr...
data.meta_site_name: BADIL Resource Center for Palestinian Residency and Refugee Rights
